introduction.p:
Consider the generic 3\times 3 matrix
\begin{bmatrix} a_{11} \amp a_{12} \amp a_{13} \\ a_{21} \amp a_{22} \amp a_{23} \\ a_{31} \amp a_{32} \amp a_{33} \end{bmatrix}.
Its determinant is a_{11}C_{11} + a_{12}C_{12} + a_{13}C_{13}.

task.p: Has this row operation changed the cofactors of entries in the first row?
